segments.text: I see the entire kitchen layout, sink on the right, cabinets on the left.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sunlight filters through the divided window panes above the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden beyond looks inviting with its neat path and bushes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, though, the faucet is left on, causing an overflow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water sheets down the front of the sink, pooling widely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's foot is submerged, yet she polishes away at her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her neutral expression shows zero awareness of the flood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Shifting focus, the boy climbs the unstable two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching high into the open cabinet for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands below, hand out, eyes full of expectation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their cooperation in sneaking treats is almost cute.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the risks—the tipping stool, slippery floor—make me anxious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish the woman would turn and stop this before trouble strikes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene screams impending accident.
segments.speaker: PAR
